description:
Learn how to conduct an persuasive, entertaining and inspiring speech that captivates every audience.

Almost everybody has to give a presentation. But most people can be way more persuasive, entertaining and inspiring. This course is designed to teach you exactly this. It is extremely easy to become an amazing speaker, but do you really know the techniques available? This course reveals what great speakers have in common and how you can learn from them.

Sharon Kroes is a former Dutch, European and worldchampion in debating and has trained more than 5.000 people, including CEO's, politicians, consultants, managers, students and many more, in the secrets of presenting in an persuasive, entertaining and inspiring manner. He is a senior partner of Debat.EU, a leading provider of persuasion services.
title: Persuasive Presentations
